Articles.Content:
> 
> 
> On 7/15/2016 at 10:31 PM, Aelfhe1m said:
> 
> 
> <iframe data-embedcontent="" frameborder="0" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/138848-113-historian-expanded/&do=embed"></iframe>
> 

how to use this... my running on ksp 1.1.2

> 
> 
> 11 hours ago, DanialADH said:
> 
> 
> how to use this... my running on ksp 1.1.2
> 

The current [release](https://github.com/Aelfhe1m/Historian-Expanded/releases) was compiled against 1.1.2 although it is also compatible with 1.1.3.  Download the zip from [that link](https://github.com/Aelfhe1m/Historian-Expanded/releases) and copy the content of the GameData folder into your own KSP GameData folder. Documentation on using and configuring Historian is in the [readme](https://github.com/Aelfhe1m/Historian-Expanded/blob/master/README.md) - several example layouts are included in the download. Happy to help if you have any specific questions.

The new update I'm currently working on will be compiled against 1.1.3 however.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-07-20T11:12:57Z" title="07/20/2016 11:12  AM" data-short="7 yr">July 20, 2016</time> by Aelfhe1m**
